name: Reflektor
description:
Reflektor is a top-down bouncing puzzle game made with Unity. It is currently in development for Microsoft Windows PCs as a university project.

The goal of the game is to use a projectile to hit a target on the other side of level. To do so, players will need to bounce their projectiles off the level's walls and obstacles. Be careful, though: each projectile can bounce only a few times before being destroyed, and your supply is limited.

Relfketor is actively being developed so look out new versions in the near future.

Sound effects were sourced from third parties via Freesound.org. Full sources: https://liveplymouthac-my.sharepoint.com/:w:/g/personal/rowan_lovejoy_students_p...
